officialTitle: A 24-week, Multicentre, Randomised, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, International Phase III Study With 24 Week Extension to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of Dapagliflozin 10 mg/Day in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control on a DPP-4 Inhibitor Sitagliptin+/-Metformin
summary: This study aims to investigate how dapagliflozin can control blood sugar in patients with type 2 diabetes when added to existing treatments (sitagliptin alone or in combination with metformin). The effect of dapagliflozin on weight and blood pressure will also be studied.

primaryOutcome.measure: Adjusted Mean Change in HbA1c Levels
